name: Gemini Rising
description:
• Explore a procedurally generated world.
  • Sneak by enemies bent on your destruction.
  • Craft new weapons and chassis upgrades to aid you in your adventure.
  • Build permanent structures to add to your capabilities and expand your base.

The game is nowhere near complete! This pre-alpha release is for gathering feedback and building a community. Nothing is polished! Nothing is final! There are so many bugs!
